name: Raptor Run
description:
Thanks for playing! Make sure to leave your best time in the comments!

Yes, the game can be played with a controller! I wasn't able to add this info into the game in time for the jam deadline - Sorry! If you're using an Xbox controller, here is the mapping (the mapping should mirror on other controllers as well):

This is my submission for the "My First Game Jam" game jam. The theme was "Free" and I decided to make a game about a dinosaur breaking out after being captured! While the raptor can chomp those humans with his mighty teeth, It's a good idea to lay low and make sure you get the drop on them or you'll be caught!
